title: ExperimentPacBio
description: Data schema for PacBio sequencing experiments.

experiment_pac_bio_id.description: Identifier for experiment_short_read (primary key). RCs make their own IDs, must begin with center abbreviation as defined in participant table; need to be globally unique in consortium; may be generated by prepending experiment_sample_id with center abbreviation

analyte_id.description: Reference to the analyte ID this experiment relates to.

experiment_sample_id.description: Identifier used in the data file (e.g. the SM tag in a BAM header, column headers for genotype fields in a VCF file). May be the same as experiment_short_read_id if the file does contain sample identifiers. Should be present if downstream file contains a sample_id (e.g. BAM, VCF). Some centers have one ID for the sample (tube) and a different ID for the sample as named in the VCF; experiment_sample_id = ID in the VCF file; analyte_id = ID for the tube/aliquot/whatever.

seq_library_prep_kit_method.description: Library prep kit used. Can be missing if RC receives external data.

fragmentation_method.description: Method used for shearing/fragmentation, e.g., Covaris g-tube (DNA volume/concentration, RCF's, etc.)

experiment_type.description: Type of experiment. While the most common use of PacBio is whole-genome sequencing, targeted sequencing is possible and may be of interest to the consortium.

targeted_region_bed_file.description: Name and path of bed file uploaded to workspace. Can be missing if RC receives external data.

date_data_generation.description: Date of data generation (First sequencing date). Can be missing if RC receives external data; ISO 8601 date format.

sequencing_platform.description: Sequencing platform used for the experiment. Can be missing if RC receives external data.

was_barcoded.description: Indicates whether samples were barcoded on this flowcell.

barcode_kit.description: Name of the kit used for barcoding.

application_kit.description: Library prep kits for special applications.

smrtlink_server_version.description: Version number of PacBio SMRTLink software.

instrument_ics_version.description: Version number of PacBio instrument control software.

size_selection_method.description: Method used for library size selection.

library_size.description: Expected size of library from FemtoPulse.

smrt_cell_kit.description: Part number of the SMRT Cell.

smrt_cell_id.description: Unique serial number for SMRT Cell.

polymerase_kit.description: Part number of polymerase kit used.

sequencing_kit.description: Part number of sequencing kit reagents.

movie_length_hours.description: Length of sequencing collection, in hours.

by_strand.description: Run reports separate reads per strand.
